content: My husband will be deploying in August and we currently have PDS orders in Hawaii but will be going home to Texas for the deployment. I know that thru 1 January 2009 the entitlements for BAH were the soldier was to receive BAH for his PDS even if the family left the island. My question is does this still stand as of now and will it still be in effect as of August 2009? Please help I can't find any updates on this entitlement. Thanks, Amanda
